GK16msabdvvu:7: vyāpāraś ca śṛṅgagrāhikayā darśayituṃ na yujyate iti viṣayamukhena pradarśyate --
GK16msabdvvu:8: jātiḥ kriyā guṇaḥ saṃjñā vācyo 'rthaḥ samitadhvaniḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:9: agṛhītasaṅketasya śabdasyārthapratipatter abhāvāt saṅketasahāya eva śabdo 'rthaṃ pratipādayati |
GK16msabdvvu:10: tena samitaḥ saṅketito dhvaniḥ śabdo yatra yo 'rthaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:11: pūrvam upalabhyatvān na tu viśrāntidhāmatvān mukhya iti prasiddho vācyo 'bhidheyo 'rthaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:14: tathāpy ānantyad vyabhicārāc ca tatra saṅketaḥ kartum na pāryata iti gauḥ śuklaś calo ḍittha ityādīnām ekārthatvaṃ mā prasāṅkṣīd iti ca śabdānām upādhāv eva saṅketaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:17: siddho 'pi dvividhaḥ padārthasya prāṇaprado viśeṣādhānahetuś ca |
GK16msabdvvu:19: uktaṃ hi vākyapadīye -- “gaur hi svarūpeṇa na gauḥ, nāpy agauḥ, gotvābhisaṃbandhāt tu gauḥ” iti |
GK16msabdvvu:23: ḍitthādiśabdānāṃ antyabuddhinirgrāhyaṃ saṃhṛtakramaṃ svarūpaṃ vaktrā yadṛcchayā ḍitthādiṣv artheṣūpādhitayā saṃniveśyate iti ca saṃjñārūpo yadṛcchātmaka iti |
GK16msabdvvu:24: gauḥ śuklaś calo ḍittha ityādau catuṣṭayī śabdānāṃ pravṛttir bhāṣye kathitā |
GK16msabdvvu:26: nanu payaḥśaṅkhādyāśrayībhūteṣu śuklādiguṇeṣu yadvaśena śuklaḥ śukla ity abhinnāv abhidhānapratyayau stas tacchuklatvādisāmānyam |
GK16msabdvvu:28: śukasārikādyudīriteṣu ḍitthādiśabdeṣu ca ḍitthādiśabdatvaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ bhidyamāne vā ḍitthādyarthe ḍitthāditvam astīti katham catuṣṭayī śabdānāṃ pravṛttiḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:30: saṃsthānāvasthānapramāṇavarṇair bhede 'pi vyaktīnāṃ śābaleyo gauḥ dhāvaleyo gaur ityādyekapratyayahetutvaṃ jāter eva |
GK16msabdvvu:31: haṃsahārādīnāṃ ghṛtaguḍādīnāṃ śukasārikādyudīritaḍitthādiśabdānāṃ nānāvasthaḍitthādyarthānāṃ ca bhede 'pi haṃsaḥ śuklaḥ,
GK16msabdvvu:36_0: ḍittho ḍittha ityekākārāvagatinibandhanatvād ekarūpatvam eva guṇakriyāyadṛcchānām
GK16msabdvvu:36_1: iti naitāsāṃ bhinneṣv abhinnābhidhānapratyayahetur jātir ghaṭata iti catvāry eva
GK16msabdvvu:39: śabde kuśala ityādau darbhagrahaṇādyayogāt gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau ca gaṅgādīnāṃ ca ghoṣādhikaraṇatāsaṃbhavāt mukhyārthasya bādhaḥ,
GK16msabdvvu:40: rūḍitaḥ prasiddheḥ tathā gaṅgātaṭa ityāder yeṣāṃ na tathā pratipattis teṣāṃ pāvanatvādīnāṃ tathāpratipādanātmanā prayojanena |
GK16msabdvvu:45: upādānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cety uktā śuddhaiva sā dvividhā || 2 ||
GK16msabdvvu:46: kuntān praveśaya yaṣṭī praveśayetyādau kuntādibhir ātmanaḥ praveśasiddhaye svasaṃyoginaḥ puruṣā ākṣipyante |
GK16msabdvvu:48: “gaur anubandhyaḥ” ityādau śruticoditam anubandhanaṃ kathaṃ me syād iti jātyā vyaktir ākṣipyate na tu śabdenocyate |
GK16msabdvvu:49: “viśeṣyaṃ nābhidhā gacchet kṣiṇaśaktir viśeṣaṇe” iti nyāyād upādānalakṣaṇā nodāhartavyā |
GK16msabdvvu:50: na hy atra prayojanam asti na vā rūḍhiḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:51: vyaktyavinābhāvāt tu jātyā vyaktir ākṣipyate yathā kriyatām ity atra kartā,
GK16msabdvvu:53: praviśa piṇḍīm ityādau gṛhaṃ bhakṣayetyādi ca |
GK16msabdvvu:54: pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte ity atra ca rātribhojanaṃ na lakṣyate |
GK16msabdvvu:56: gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ity atra taṭasya ghoṣādhikaraṇatāyāḥ siddhaye gaṅgāśabdaḥ svārtham arpayatīty evamādau lakṣaṇenaiṣā lakṣaṇā |
GK16msabdvvu:58: anayor bhedayor lakṣyasya lakṣakasya ca na bhedarūpaṃ taṭasthatvam |
GK16msabdvvu:59: taṭādīnāṃ gaṅgādiśabdaiḥ pratipādane tattvapratipattau hi pratipipādayiṣitaprayojanasampratyayaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:60: gaṅgāsambandhamātrapratītau tu gaṅgātaṭe ghoṣa iti mukhyaśabdābhidhānāl lakṣaṇāyāḥ ko bhedaḥ ||
GK16msabdvvu:61: sāropānyā tu yatroktau viṣayī viṣayas tathā |
GK16msabdvvu:62: āropyamāṇa āropaviśayaś ca yatrānupahnutabhedau sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdiśyete sā lakṣaṇā sāropā |
GK16msabdvvu:65: bhedāv imau ca sādṛśyāt saṃbandhāntaratas tathā |
GK16msabdvvu:67: imāv āropādhyavasānarūpau sādṛśyahetū gaur vāhīka ity atra gaur ayam ity atra ca |
GK16msabdvvu:68: atra svārthasahacāriṇo guṇā jāḍyamāndyādayo lakṣyamāṇā api gośabdasya parārthābhidhānaṃ prati nimittatvam upayāntīti kecit |
GK16msabdvvu:69: svārthasahacāriguṇābhedena parārthagatā guṇā eva lakṣyante na tu parārtho 'bhidhīyata ity apare |
GK16msabdvvu:70: sādhāraṇaguṇāśrayaṇena parārtha eva lakṣyata ity anye | uktaṃ cānyatra --
GK16msabdvvu:72: lakṣyamāṇaguṇair yogād vṛtter iṣṭā tu gauṇatā
GK16msabdvvu:75: tattve hi mañcāḥ krośantītyādau lakṣaṇā na syāt |
GK16msabdvvu:76: avinābhāve cākṣepeṇaiva siddher lakṣaṇāyā nopayoga ity uktam |
GK16msabdvvu:77: yena gogatajāḍyamāndyādisadṛśajāḍyamāndyetyādy ucyate tena guṇābhedābhyupagame guṇajātiprasaṅgāc catuṣṭayī śabdānāṃ pravṛttir uktā vyāhanyate |
GK16msabdvvu:78: āyur ghṛtam, āyur evedam ityādau sādṛśyād anyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvādiḥ paraḥ sambandhaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:80: atra gauṇabhedayor bhede 'pi tādrūpyapratītiḥ sarvathāivābhedāvagamaś ca prayojanam |
GK16msabdvvu:82: kvacit tādarthyād upacāraḥ, yathā indrārthā sthūṇā indraḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:83: kvacit svasvāmibhāvāt, yathā rājakīyaḥ puruṣo rājā |
GK16msabdvvu:84: kvacid avayavāvayavibhāvāt, yathā agrahasta ity atrāgramātrāvayave hastaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:88: sā ca “vaktur vākyasya vācyasya rūpabhedād vibhidyate” |
GK16msabdvvu:90: upakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kim ucyate sujanatā prathitā bhavatā param |
GK16msabdvvu:91: vidadhad īdṛśam eva sadā sakhe sukhitam āssva tataḥ śaradām śatam ||
GK16msabdvvu:92: bahubhir upakārais tāpyamānasya kasyacid uktir iyam |
GK16msabdvvu:93: ato vaktṛmahimnā mūrkhe bṛhaspatiḍśabdena mūrkhatvam ivāpakāriṇi durjanatvādy atra lakṣyate |
GK16msabdvvu:97: nīvīṃ prati praṇihite ca kare priyeṇa
GK16msabdvvu:98: sakhyaḥ śapāmi yadi kiṃcid api smarāmi ||
GK16msabdvvu:105: atra prāṇasamasya vyasane 'pi taṭasthas tṛṇamātram api dātum asamarthaś ca vācyaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:106: evaṃ dvikabhedās trayaḥ trikabhedaś caika udāhāryaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:107: dṛṣṭiṃ he prativeśini kṣaṇam ihāpy asmadgṛhe dāsyasi
GK16msabdvvu:108: prāyo naiva śiśoḥ pitāsya virasāḥ kaupīr apaḥ pāsyasi |
GK16msabdvvu:109: ekākiny api yāmi tad drutam itaḥ srotas tamālākulaṃ
GK16msabdvvu:112: prāptaśrīr eṣa kasmāt punar api mayi taṃ manthakhedaṃ vidadhyān
GK16msabdvvu:113: nidrām apy asya pūrvām analasamanaso naiva sambhāvayāmi |
GK16msabdvvu:114: setuṃ badhnāti bhūyaḥ kim iti ca sakaladvīpanāthānuyāte
GK16msabdvvu:115: tvayy āyāte vitarkān iti dadhata ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ ||
GK16msabdvvu:117: durvārā madaneṣavo diśi diśi vyājṛmbhate mādhavo
GK16msabdvvu:120: soḍhavyāḥ sakhi sāmprataṃ katham amī pañcāgnayo duḥsahā ||
GK16msabdvvu:121: ity atra ca nādeyapānīyānayanena parapuruṣasambhogasya naḍagranthalekhanena sambhāvyamānanakhadaśanakṣatānāṃ ca nihnavātmakaṃ vastu,
GK16msabdvvu:123: vipralambhaśṛṅgāraś ca raso lakṣyata iti nodāhāryam |
GK16msabdvvu:126: ākṣiptasyālaṅkārasya lakṣyatve ca vahnyānayane pātrānayanasya lakṣyatvaprasaṅgāt |
GK16msabdvvu:128: saprayojanāyāṃ ca lakṣaṇāyāṃ tadatirikto vyāpāro 'vaśyam aṅgīkartavyaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:130: tac ca na mukhyārthabādhanimittavat pramāṇāntarād boddhavyam |
GK16msabdvvu:136: satyām api vā tasyāṃ niyatasmaraṇaṃ na syāt |
GK16msabdvvu:140: na lakṣaṇā tasmin sati hi sā na tu tadviṣayā |
GK16msabdvvu:143: tasyāpi lakṣaṇe 'navasthāpattir iti na lakṣaṇā syāt |
GK16msabdvvu:147_0: nanu gaṅgātaṭe ghoṣa ityādisvaśabdād yādṛgarthapratītir na bhavati tādṛśī gaṅgāyāṃ
GK16msabdvvu:147_1: ghoṣa ityādes tad eva prayojanaṃ pāvanatvādidharmākrāntaṃ ca taṭādi lakṣyate iti
GK16msabdvvu:147_2: viśiśṭe lakṣaṇā na tu lakṣite viśeṣāḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:148: evaṃ hi taṭādeḥ pāvanatvādīnāṃ ca dharmadharmibhāvaś caturtho vyāpāra urarīkartavyaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:150: na ca vyāpārasya lakṣaṇātmano vyañjanātmā vyāpāro bhavati |
GK16msabdvvu:152: tarhi lakṣaṇāyāḥ prayojanaṃ tasmād viśiṣṭam eva lakṣyate |
GK16msabdvvu:157: sāmānyaniṣṭhaś ca saṅketa iti tritayātmanā saṅketabhedena lakṣaṇā sā kathaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ gocarīkuryāt |
GK16msabdvvu:159: kiṃca lakṣaṇāyā gocaro lakṣyo na prayojanam |
GK16msabdvvu:163: evaṃ hy abhidhāyā api phalaṃ śabdasya ca vācakasya saṃvid eva phalam |
GK16msabdvvu:164: tac ca vinā vyāpārān na sambhavati |
GK16msabdvvu:165: na ca vyāpārasya vyāpāra iti śabdasyaivāsau vācyaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:166: lakṣaṇānvayavyatirekānuvidhānaṃ ca savyāpārasya phalasyeti tasyās tat kāryaṃ kāryaṃ ca phalam ucyate |
GK16msabdvvu:167: kriyāntaraprāpyasya yāgaphalatvam iva vyañjanaśaktinirvartyasya prayojanasya lakṣaṇāphalatvam |
GK16msabdvvu:168: nīlaviṣayasya pramāṇasya yathā nīlaniṣṭhaiva prakaṭatā saṃvid vā phalam tadval lakṣaṇāyās tadviṣayaniṣṭham eva prayojanam |
GK16msabdvvu:170: tena siddham etal lakṣaṇāyā atirikto vyāpāraḥ samāśraṇīyaḥ ||
GK16msabdvvu:171: nirūḍhā kācanānyā tu kāryā sā kācid anyathā |
GK16msabdvvu:172: anulomapratikūlādiśabdeṣu kācana sā vācyam arthaṃ parihṛtya lakṣya evārthe vācakavan nirūḍhā |
GK16msabdvvu:176: ityādāv andhādiśabdeṣu anupapadyamānatvād vācyam atyantatiraskṛtam iti vicchāyatvasya lakṣitasyāsāmānyatvaṃ vyaṅgyam | tathā --
GK16msabdvvu:177: sa puruṣaḥ sa ca jīvati satkṛtaṃ
GK16msabdvvu:182: rephadvayānugatabhramarādiśabdābhidheyatve dvirephaśabdaḥ ṣaṭpade yathā prayujyate tathā kokilādau dvika ityādikā anyathā na prayojyāḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:184: ihānantyād vyabhicārāc ca vākyasya vākyārtha iva viśeṣarūpe padārthe padasya saṅketaḥ kartuṃ na pāryate iti sāmānya eva saṅketaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:185: ākāṅkṣāsannidhiyogyatāvaśāt sāmānyānām abhihitānāṃ satām anvaya iti padārthānāṃ vaiśiṣṭyam |
GK16msabdvvu:187: atra pakṣe pūrvam abhidhā tato 'nvayabādhe lakṣaṇā |
GK16msabdvvu:189: devadatta gām ānayetyady uttamavṛddhavākyaśravaṇān madhyamavṛddhau viśiṣṭaṃ vyāpāraṃ karotīti dṛṣṭvā vyutpādyamāno nirvibhāge 'rthe nirvibhāgaṃ vākyaṃ vācakaṃ jānāti |
GK16msabdvvu:190_0: tato yajñadatta gām ānayetyādivākyāntaraprayoge sati anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ niyatasya
GK16msabdvvu:190_1: niyatārtham avasyatīti sāmānyāvacchādite viśiṣṭa eva padārthe padānāṃ saṅketa ity
GK16msabdvvu:190_2: anvitānām eva satām abhidhānam iti viśiṣṭānāṃ padārthatā |
GK16msabdvvu:191: atra pakṣe abhidhāyāḥ pura ādau lakṣaṇā, viśiṣṭasyaiva padārthatvāt |
GK16msabdvvu:193: padāpekṣayābhihitānvayaḥ vākyāpekṣayā tv anvitābhidhānam iti dvayapakṣe dvayam |
GK16msabdvvu:197: padeṣu varṇavad vākyeṣu hi padānām anarthakatvam |
GK16msabdvvu:199: kaśābhidhānāt turagasya yathā preṣito 'ham anena dhāvana iti pratibhodeti tadvat pratibhāvaśād viśiṣtavākyāt pratipattir iti saiva vākyārthaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:200: asatyabhūtaprakṛtipratyayādikalpanavad avidyāpade padārthakalpanāyāṃ tūkteṣu pakṣeṣu trayaḥ pakṣāḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:201: yaś ca sambandho lakṣaṇāyā nimittaṃ taṃ pañcavidham āhuḥ | yathoktaṃ
GK16msabdvvu:203: vaiparītyāt kriyāyogāl lakṣaṇā pañcadhā matā || iti |
GK16msabdvvu:205: tatsambandhāt tena ṣaṭpado lakṣyate iti abhidheyasambandhanimittatā |
GK16msabdvvu:206: sādṛśyād yathā siṃho māṇavaka iti | yathā vā --
GK16msabdvvu:207: varṣe samasta evaikaḥ ślāghyaḥ ko 'py eṣa vāsaraḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:208: dinair mahattayānveyo yo na pūrvair na cāparaiḥ ||
GK16msabdvvu:209: atra prakaraṇavaśād mahāpuruṣaḥ kaścil lakṣyate yasya kule pūrve bhāvino vā puruṣā na samānatvam upayānti |
GK16msabdvvu:214: atra hi chatrisāhacaryād achatrā apy evaṃ vyapadiśyante |
GK16msabdvvu:215: vaiparītyād yathā kātare bhārgava iti | kriyāyogād yathā
GK16msabdvvu:216: pṛthur asi guṇaiḥ kīrtyā rāmo nalo bharato bhavān
GK16msabdvvu:217: mahati samara śatrughnas tvaṃ tathā janakaḥ sthiteḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:219: katham asi na māṃdhātā deva trilokavijayy api ||
GK16msabdvvu:223_0: yathā saṃketena mukhyārthabādhāditritayena ca sahāyenābhidhāyako lakṣakaś ca yathā
GK16msabdvvu:223_1: vā pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekasahagato vivakṣāyā anumāpakaḥ tathā pratibhānair malyavidagdhaparicayaprakaraṇādijñānasāpekṣo
GK16msabdvvu:223_2: vācako lakṣyakaś ca vyaṅgyam arthaṃ dhvaniśabdo vyanakti | tatra vyaṅgyaḥ
GK16msabdvvu:230: attā ettha ṇimajjai ettha ahaṃ diasaaḥ paloehi |
GK16msabdvvu:231: mā pahia rattiandhaa sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi ||
GK16msabdvvu:233: mā pathika rātryandha śayyāyām āvayor nimaṅkṣyasi || ]
GK16msabdvvu:234: atrābhidhānamūlaṃ vyañjanam | lakṣaṇāmūlaṃ yathā -- niśvāsāndha ivādarśa ity udāhṛtam |
GK16msabdvvu:239: kvāste duryodhano 'sau kathayata na ruṣā draṣṭum abhyāgatau svaḥ ||
GK16msabdvvu:240: atraite varākā dāsabhāvaṃ gatāḥ kiṃ kariṣyanti asmadekaśaraṇāḥ paribhaviṣyanti ityādi dyūtakāle bhavadbhiś cintitam āsīn nāsmakaṃ vismṛtam |
GK16msabdvvu:241: tatra kācit pratikriyā nirvyūḍhā na kiṃ nirvyūḍhā ityādikaṃ tam artham abhivyajya sarvair eva kartā dyūtachalānām ityādibhir vācya evārthe viśramyate |
GK16msabdvvu:247: atra dattasaṃketaḥ puruṣo vānīralatāgṛhaṃ praviṣṭa iti vyaṅgyam artham avagamayya vācyo 'rthaḥ svaprādhānyenāsti |
GK16msabdvvu:248: na caivam abhidhāyā lakṣaṇāyā vā kaścid avasara iti bhinnam eva dhvananam |
GK16msabdvvu:249: nanu ‘yat paraḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha'; iti vyaṅgyābhimato 'pi tātparyāt katham na vācyaḥ |
GK16msabdvvu:250_0: iha sarvāṇy eva kārakāṇi kārakatvāt savyāpārāṇīti sādhyāyamānāny ato bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇe
GK16msabdvvu:250_1: “bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata” ity adagdhadahananyāyena yāvad avahitaṃ tāvad vidhīyate
GK16msabdvvu:252: evaṃ hi pūrvo dhāvatīty aparārthe 'pi tātparyaṃ syāt |
GK16msabdvvu:256: evaṃ ca vācyatve kā vārttā vācyaviparītātmano vyaṅgyasya |
GK16msabdvvu:257: na tu vyaṅgyam anumeyam iti śakyaṃ vaktum |
GK16msabdvvu:258: na hi vācyavyaṅgyayoḥ pratibandhagrahe kiñcit pramāṇaṃ kramate |
GK16msabdvvu:262: evaṃbhūtāyāṃ pramāṇair apratipannāyāṃ hi sāmagryām upapattim anapekṣyāpi samudayamānā pratītiḥ kena nihnotuṃ śakyata iti |
GK16msabdvvu:264: etac cānyatra vistareṇa vicāritam iti saṃkṣepeṇehoktam iti śivam ||
